mapper.insert:
SELECT zmessage_seq.nextval FROM dual
INSERT INTO zmessage (msg_no, receiver_no, sender_no, msg_title, msg_content) VALUES (#{msgNo }, #{receiverNo }, #{senderNo }, #{msgTitle }, #{msgContent })
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT rownum rnum, M.* FROM ( SELECT m.msg_no, m.sender_no, m.receiver_no , m.msg_title, m.msg_content, m.msg_date, m.msg_check, u.user_nick FROM ZMESSAGE m INNER JOIN ZUSER u ON(m.sender_no = u.user_no) WHERE receiver_no = #{userNo } AND receiver_show = 'y' ORDER BY msg_date DESC ) M ) R WHERE rnum between #{paging.startNo } AND #{paging.endNo }
